Issue.creator: scottz
Issue.summary: add details to OTE test names
Issue.description: Examples: ./runote.sh # run the default testcase FAB-6996_1ch_solo ./runote.sh -t FAB-6996_1ch_solo # basic test with 1 channel, 1 solo orderer ./runote.sh -t FAB-7936_100tx_3ch_3ord_3kb # short test covering OTE functionalities The supported testcases are: FAB-6996_1ch_solo FAB-7070 FAB-7024 FAB-7071 FAB-7026 FAB-7072 FAB-7027 FAB-7073 FAB-7036 FAB-7074 FAB-7037 FAB-7075 FAB-7038 FAB-7936_100tx_3ch_3ord_3kb FAB-7076 FAB-7039 FAB-7077 FAB-7058 FAB-7078 FAB-7059 FAB-7079 FAB-7060 FAB-7080 FAB-7061 FAB-7081 >
